Model
Brand: ASUS
Series: ROG
Model: ROG STRIX B760-A GAMING WIFI
Part Number: 90MB1EP0-M0AAY0


Supported CPU
CPU Socket Type: LGA 1700
CPU Type: Intel Socket LGA1700 for 13th Gen Intel® Core & 12th Gen Intel Core, Pentium® Gold and Celeron Processors
Supports Intel® Turbo Boost Technology 2.0 and Intel® Turbo Boost Max Technology 3.0**


Chipsets
Chipset: Intel B760


Memory
Number of Memory Slots: 4x288pin (DDR5)
Memory Standard: DDR5 
7800+(OC)/7600(OC)/7400(OC)/7200(OC)/7000(OC)/6800(OC)/6600(OC)/6400(OC)/ 6200(OC)/6000(OC)/5800(OC)/5600/5400/5200/5000/4800 Non-ECC, Un-buffered Memory*
Maximum Memory Supported: 256GB
Channel Supported: Dual Channel


Expansion Slots
PCI Express 5.0 x16: 1 x PCI Express 5.0 x16
PCI Express 3.0 x16: 1 x PCIe 3.0 x16 slot (supports x4 mode)*
2 x PCIe 3.0 x1 slots*
* PCIe x1(G3)_1 and PCIe x1(G3)_2 slots share bandwidth with PCIe x16(G3). When PCIe x1(G3)_1 or PCIe x1(G3)_2 slot is operating, PCIe x16(G3) will only supports x2 mode.
- To ensure compatibility of the device installed, please refer to https://www.asus.com/support/ for the list of supported peripherals.


Storage Devices
SATA 6Gb/s: 4 x SATA 6Gb/s
M.2: 3 x M.2 (Support PCIe 4.0 x4)
SATA RAID: 0/1/5/10


Onboard Audio
Audio Channels: ROG SupremeFX 7.1 Surround Sound High Definition Audio CODEC ALC4080
- Impedance sense for front and rear headphone outputs
- Supports: Jack-detection, Multi-streaming, Front Panel Jack-retasking
- High quality 120 dB SNR stereo playback output and 113 dB SNR recording input
- Supports up to 32-Bit/384 kHz playback
Audio Features 
- SupremeFX Shielding Technology
- Savitech SV3H712 AMP  
- Premium audio capacitors
- Dedicated audio PCB layers
- Audio cover


Onboard LAN
Max LAN Speed: 1 x Intel® 2.5Gb Ethernet
ASUS LANGuard
Wireless LAN: Wi-Fi 6E
2x2 Wi-Fi 6E (802.11 a/b/g/n/ac/ax) 
Supports 2.4/5/6GHz frequency band*
Bluetooth® v5.3**
* WiFi 6E 6GHz regulatory may vary between countries.
** The Bluetooth version may vary, please refer to the Wi-Fi module manufacturer's website for the latest specifications.
Bluetooth: Yes

Back I/O Ports: 1 x USB 3.2 Gen 2x2 (20G) port (1 x USB Type-C®)
1 x USB 3.2 Gen 2 (10G) port (1 x Type-A)
